subject: I can help you
body: Other occasional uses: at hva/ro both times (Hym. 33); at so/goro under such circumstances (Grp. 24, 40); at ho/fi with moderation (Ha/v. 19); at sama ho/fi to the same degree (Vkv. 27); qve.a at or.i to speak (Am.32, 34); fallin at fr.ndom bereft of kinsmen (Hm. 5//3; simil. va.in at vilia: Hm. 5/////////5; cf. G.r. III 5); .ver.o .eir .ro/tt sinn at .ri.iungi they decreased their strength by a third (Hm. 15).
